Side dish: Coconut Chutney Duration: 10 mins Basic Cooking, Today I'm sharing a basic & common side dish for South Indian Breakfast Recipes. It is the best combo ever, quick to make and healthy too. It suits with a list of breakfast recipes as shown below , I hope they're helpful to you ğŸ™‚
  • Plain Dosa
  • Idly
  • Kanchipuram Idly
  • Masala Dosa
  • Poori
  • Onion Uttapam
  • Masala Upma
  • Ghee Podi Masala Dosa
  • Rava Dosa
  • Pongal
The list goes on, so learn this basic chutney and enjoy with multiple Breakfast recipes ğŸ˜Š Let's start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Fresh Coconut - Shredded - 180 gms
  • Split Roasted chickpeas/ pappulu - 60 gms
  • Green chillies - 2
  • Salt - as per taste - I added 1 tsp
  • Oil - 2 tsp
  • Mustard seeds - 1/4 tsp
  • Cumin seeds - 1/2 tsp
  • Urad Dal / skinless black gram - 1/2 tsp
  • Curry leaves - 6
Procedure:
  • Add split roasted chickpeas , shredded coconut , salt, green chillies in mixer
  • And also add 100 ml water, to blend into smooth paste
  • Blend well & take out in a bowl
  • Next tempering, Heat pan over medium heat
  • Add oil, mustard seeds and cumin seeds
  • Let them splutter and then add urad dal, finally curry leaves
  • Saute & turn off heat
  • Transfer tempering in coconut mixture
  • Mix well and serve with any South Indian breakfast.. it tastes awesome
